title: Got2b Smooth Operator Smoothing Hairspray, 9.2 Ounce
description: Give your tresses a treat with got2b Smooth Operator Smoothing Hairspray.  This indulgent finishing spray infused with cashmere smoothes fly-aways and frizzies and keeps your style in place while providing an oh-so-touchable finish that’s full of movement.  It’s the luxury you deserve for invisibly seductive style.

title: Herstyler Classic Forever Ceramic Flat Iron
description: Solid ceramic plates guarantee smooth straightening motion without pulling or breakage of hair. Faster heat-up time than conventional coil straightening irons - It will rise to the desired temperature in less than 25 seconds from being turned on.

title: Hair Art Foldable Wig Stand
description: Ideal for washig, drying, setting, travel & storage.
